sentences.sentence: Which ONE brand of sports apparels you own more than the others.
sentences.translation: 你拥有的运动衣服中那一个品牌最多？

sentences.sentence: All our staff members have rich work experience in shoes and apparels.
sentences.translation: 我们的所有工作人员，有丰富的工作经验，在鞋和服装。

sentences.sentence: There is an array of apparels seen in the market, made from recycled fabrics.
sentences.translation: 现在市场上由再生面料制作的服装已形成了强大的阵容。
